lines.text: When we get together, we have a bomb. Then we set it off.

[angry]
Are you gonna stick a poison suppository up my ass while I'm fuckin' you?
I like you. You're thin and you've got big tits.

[feeling her breast]
I like you, you're quiet.

[after smoking a "friendship pipe"]
Now I am connected to you, you are connected to me and we are connected to this place. The rest is postcards!

[while eating tongue]
That tongue smells tasty, babes. Can I have the shulm?
You can't have the shulm. It's not good for you.
Hey, fuck off! I want the goddamn shulm!
Everything comes together... everything falls apart.
